remarks: Self-referential expression for the ` Z/nZ ` structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
znval2.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) $.
znval2.u $e |- U = ( ZZring /s ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) $.
znval2.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
znval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` Y ) $.
znval2 $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> Y = ( U sSet <. ( le ` ndx ) , .<_ >. ) ) $.
